name: Voin
details: Crafted by a solo developer, VOIN is a first-person hack-and-slash. Cleave through hordes of enemies in fast-paced combat. Explore dark fantasy realms filled with secrets and dangers. Discover powerful gear and weapons, and face menacing bosses in your quest to cleanse a broken world.

name: The Cabin Factory
details: Welcome to The Cabin Factory - as a newly hired Cabin Inspector your job is to inspect the cabins and determine whether or not they are haunted.

name: among ashes
details: Among Ashes features a unique concept where you play a horror game called "Night Call" within the main game. This adds layers to the horror experience.

name: MiSide
details: The game revolves around a protagonist who is mysteriously drawn into a mobile simulation game. Players navigate this surreal world

name: path of exile 2
details: Path of Exile (PoE) is a popular online action RPG developed by Grinding Gear Games. The game is set in a dark fantasy world and offers deep character customization, a vast skill tree, and engaging gameplay.

name: Indiana Jones and the Great Circle
details: The game features a mix of exploration, puzzle-solving, and combat, with players navigating through various real-world locations like the Vatican City, Thailand, Egypt, and Shanghai

name: Delta Force
details:
The new Delta Force game is making a comeback after 15 years.
The game features large-scale PvP battles and an extraction mode where players compete for gear and cash. It also includes a remaster of the 2003 campaign, Delta Force: Black Hawk Down

name: Sid Meier's Civilization VII
details: In Civilization VII, you build and lead an empire through distinct Ages of human history. Each Age offers unique civilizations, resources, and gameplay systems. You can choose legendary leaders with unique abilities and customize their attributes to reinforce or pivot your strategy as you progress through the Ages.

name: Elden Ring
details: GAME

name: Marvel Rivals
details: Marvel Rivals is a 6v6 player-versus-player, third-person hero shooter. The game features a lineup of 33 characters from Marvel Comics and offers cross-play across all platforms. It includes destructible environments and various game modes such as Convoy, Domination, and Convergence

name: Grand Theft Auto IV
details:
Grand Theft Auto IV is the sixth main entry in the Grand Theft Auto series. The game is set in the fictional Liberty City, based on New York City, and follows the story of Eastern European war veteran Niko Bellic as he tries to escape his past while under pressure from high-profile criminals. The game features an open-world design, allowing players to freely roam Liberty City, which consists of three main islands and the neighboring state of Alderney.
The game includes both single-player and multiplayer modes, with the latter allowing up to 32 players to engage in cooperative and competitive gameplay.Two expansion packs, "The Lost and Damned" and "The Ballad of Gay Tony," were later released, featuring new plots interconnected with the main storyline.

name: Splitgate 2
details: Splitgate 2 is a 4v4 competitive multiplayer game that combines fast-paced portal gunplay with objective-based game modes. Players can teleport across the map to outsmart opponents, customize weapons, and master portaling skills. The game features three factions: Aeros, Meridian, and Sabrask, each with unique abilities.

name: Kingdom Come Deliverance
details:
Kingdom Come: Deliverance is set in the medieval Kingdom of Bohemia, an Imperial State of the Holy Roman Empire, with a focus on historically accurate content. The story takes place during a war in Bohemia in 1403, in the times of King Wenceslaus IV. Players control Henry, the son of a blacksmith, who seeks revenge for his murdered family and becomes involved in an effort to restore Bohemia's rightful king.

The game features an open-world environment, branching quest lines, and period-accurate weapons, clothing, combat techniques, and architecture. It utilizes a classless role-playing system, allowing players to customize their skills and take on various roles.

dlc.name: The Amorous Adventures of Bold Sir Hans Capon

name: Kingdom Come: Deliverance II
details:
Kingdom Come: Deliverance II is an action role-playing game developed by Warhorse Studios and published by Deep Silver. Serving as the sequel to the 2018 game Kingdom Come: Deliverance, it continues the historically grounded narrative set in 15th-century Bohemia.

Gameplay and Features:

Setting: The game is set in 15th-century Bohemia, continuing the story of Henry, a blacksmith's son, amidst the turmoil of a civil war.

Game World: The open world is reported to be twice as large as that of the original game, featuring two expansive areas: the Bohemian Paradise and the city of Kutn� Hora (Kuttenberg).

Combat: The sequel introduces new weaponry, including crossbows and early firearms, enhancing the game's realistic combat mechanics.

Gameplay Mechanics: Players can expect a life simulation experience where the protagonist requires regular sleep and food. The game emphasizes realism, with society and NPCs reacting dynamically to the player's actions, influencing character development and the game world.

Game Length: The base game is estimated to offer 80 to 100 hours of gameplay, excluding DLCs.

Cutscenes: The narrative is interspersed with approximately five hours of cinematic cutscenes.

Development Team: The game is directed by Daniel V�vra, with Martin Kl�ma serving as producer and Viktor Bocan as designer. The music is composed by Jan Valta and Adam Sporka.

name: Exodus
details: The game is set in a distant future where humanity has fled a dying Earth and found a new home in a hostile galaxy. Players take on the role of "The Traveler," humanity's last hope, navigating through challenges in an uncharted cosmos. The game incorporates a time dilation mechanic, where days for the player can mean decades back home, affecting the game's narrative and player choices. Matthew McConaughey voices a character in the game.

name: Intergalactic: The Heretic Prophet
details: "Intergalactic: The Heretic Prophet" is an upcoming action-adventure game developed by Naughty Dog and published by Sony Interactive Entertainment. Set in a retro-futuristic universe, the game follows Jordan A. Mun, a bounty hunter stranded on the enigmatic planet Sempiria, which has been isolated from the rest of the universe for over 600 years.

name: Elden Ring: Nightreign
details:
Cooperative Play: Designed primarily for three-player cooperative gameplay, allowing teams to face challenges together. Notably, two-player co-op is not supported, a decision made for game balance reasons.
Procedurally Generated World: Set in a procedurally generated version of Limgrave, offering varied experiences with each playthrough.
Gameplay Structure: Players have three in-game days to prepare for a final boss encounter, facing mini-bosses at the end of the first two days. The gameplay area shrinks over time, similar to mechanics found in battle royale games.
Crossplay: The game will not support cross-platform play; players can only team up with others on the same platform.

name: Ambulance Life: A Paramedic Simulator
details: "Ambulance Life: A Paramedic Simulator" is an upcoming simulation game that immerses players in the life of a paramedic, emphasizing emergency response and patient care.

name: Shadow Labyrinth
details: "Shadow Labyrinth" is an upcoming 2D action platformer developed by Bandai Namco Studios and published by Bandai Namco Entertainment. The game offers a genre-twisting alternate take on the iconic PAC-MAN franchise, presenting a darker and more mature interpretation of the classic maze concept.

name: Borderlands 4
details:
Seamless World Exploration: The game introduces a "seamless" world design, allowing players to explore new areas without loading screens. This design enhances immersion and provides a more cohesive experience.
Set on the planet Kairos, players will encounter diverse environments distinct from previous settings, offering fresh landscapes and challenges.
New traversal tools, such as a grappling hook, are introduced, providing players with innovative ways to navigate the environment and engage in combat. 
Maintaining the series' tradition, "Borderlands 4" supports both solo play and cooperative multiplayer, allowing up to four players to team up and tackle missions together.

name: Turok: Origins
details:
Perspective Shift: The game transitions from the series' traditional first-person perspective to an over-the-shoulder third-person view, offering a fresh gameplay experience.
Cooperative Gameplay: Players can engage in both solo and cooperative multiplayer modes, teaming up to face challenges together.
Narrative: Players assume the roles of legendary Turok warriors uniting to save humanity from an aggressive alien species and total annihilation.
Enemy Encounters: The game features battles against ferocious dinosaurs and a terrifying alien threat, maintaining the series' hallmark of prehistoric and sci-fi adversaries.
Upgradable Weapons and Abilities: Players can utilize enemies' DNA to upgrade their arsenal and abilities, adding a strategic layer to combat.

name: Split Fiction
details:
"Split Fiction" is an upcoming action-adventure platform game developed by Hazelight Studios and published by Electronic Arts. Known for their previous co-op titles like "It Takes Two" and "A Way Out," Hazelight continues their tradition of delivering engaging cooperative experiences.
Designed exclusively for split-screen cooperative multiplayer, requiring two players to collaborate either locally or online.
Players control Mio and Zoe, two authors trapped within their own stories, blending science fiction and fantasy elements. They must work together to escape and reclaim their creative legacies.
Each level introduces unique gameplay mechanics, ranging from taming dragons to engaging in cyber ninja combat, ensuring varied and dynamic experiences.
Allows owners of the game to invite a friend to play for free, facilitating cooperative play without requiring both players to purchase the game. 
Cross-Platform Play: Supports cross-play between PlayStation 5, Xbox Series X|S, and PC, enabling seamless cooperative experiences across different platforms.

name: Onimusha: Way of the Sword
details:
"Onimusha: Way of the Sword" is an upcoming action-adventure game developed and published by Capcom, marking the return of the acclaimed Onimusha series after nearly two decades.
Setting: The game is set in Edo-era Kyoto, now twisted by malevolent clouds of Malice, providing a dark and atmospheric backdrop.
Protagonist: Players follow the tale of a samurai who wields the Oni Gauntlet, a mystical artifact granting the power to slay Genma, the series' demonic adversaries.
Combat: Expect intense swordplay action, with battles against various monstrosities from the underworld known as Genma.
Exploration: Players will explore the historic Japanese capital, with each stage cloaked in mystery, danger, and intrigue.

name: Uncle Chop's Rocket Shop
details: In "Uncle Chop's Rocket Shop," players assume the role of Wilbur, a fox-like spaceship mechanic working under the watchful eye of Uncle Chop. The game combines simulation and puzzle-solving within a roguelite framework, challenging players to diagnose and repair various spaceship modules under time constraints. The gameplay emphasizes reading comprehension and problem-solving skills, with a humorous narrative and unique art style.

name: Grand Theft Auto VI
details:
The game is set in the fictional open world state of Leonida, which includes Vice City, a fictionalized version of Miami.
The story follows a criminal duo, Lucia and her male partner.
